author: vmassol
msg: Changing coding conventions for brackets to be more "standard". The code will soon be changed to reflect this.

author: vmassol
msg: The encoding in the sample junit-noframes XSL stylesheet was set to be "US-ASCII". It is now set to "UTF-8". Apparently, XSLT processors are only required to support utf-8 and utf-16, the rest is processor specific. For example your processor might spupport US-ASCII-7 and others might support US-ASCII. Thanks to Robert Koberg for the explanation!
